s1.ptxt: Remove instrument panel referring to Instrument Panel Removal and Installation .
Remove HVAC unit. Refer to HVAC Unit Removal and Installation .
Remove heater core pipe clamp and then, pull out heater core (1) from HVAC unit.
Install heater core by reversing removal procedure, noting the following items.

item.ptxt: When installing heater core, be careful not to damage fins of heater core.
When installing each part, be careful not to catch any wiring harness.

s1.ptxt: Fill engine coolant referring to step 13) to 20) of Cooling System Refilling .
Enable air bag system referring to Enabling Air Bag System .
